nodes.beat: Jack, a curious boy, trades his family's last cow for magic beans.
His mother, furious, throws the beans out of the window.
Overnight, a giant beanstalk grows, reaching into the Quantum Realm.
Jack, filled with curiosity, climbs the beanstalk.
In the Quantum Realm, Jack discovers a castle inhabited by a giant.
Jack steals a golden goose from the giant's castle.
The giant chases Jack down the beanstalk.
Jack, reaching home, cuts down the beanstalk, causing the giant to fall and disappear.
Jack and his mother live happily with the golden goose laying golden eggs.
Jack plants the beans in the garden himself, curious about their magic.
In the Quantum Realm, Jack encounters a friendly quantum creature.
The creature guides Jack to a castle where a golden harp is kept.
Jack takes the harp and returns home, leaving the Quantum Realm behind.
Jack and his mother live happily with the magical harp that plays beautiful music.
Jack, a brave boy, is given magic beans by a mysterious old man.
Jack reaches a castle in the Quantum Realm and finds a sleeping giant.
Jack steals a bag of golden coins without waking the giant.
Jack and his mother live a comfortable life with the wealth from the golden coins.
Jack encounters quantum creatures who warn him about a treasure-guarding giant.
Jack sneaks into the giant's castle and finds a chest of quantum gems.
Jack takes the gems and escapes the castle before the giant wakes up.
Jack and his mother live a prosperous and peaceful life with the quantum gems.
Jack discovers a castle with a garden of quantum fruits.
Jack takes some quantum fruits and returns home.
The quantum fruits provide Jack and his mother with endless food supply.
Jack encounters a quantum creature trapped by a giant.
Jack rescues the creature and is rewarded with a quantum crystal.
Jack and his mother live a life of abundance with the power of the quantum crystal.
Jack discovers a castle with a golden hen.
Jack takes the hen and escapes the giant's castle.
Jack and his mother live happily with the golden hen laying golden eggs.
Jack discovers a castle with a quantum mirror that shows the future.
Jack takes the mirror and returns home.
Jack and his mother live a content life, using the mirror to foresee and avoid troubles.
